title: U-Maine men's ice hockey team holds Blue and White scrimmage
text:
U-Maine men's ice hockey team holds Blue and White scrimmage U-Maine men's ice hockey team holds Blue and White scrimmage Post to Facebook U-Maine men's ice hockey team holds Blue and White scrimmage U-Maine men's ice hockey team holds Blue and White scrimmage   wlbz2.com: http://on.wlbz2.com/1RpJF11   U-Maine men's ice hockey team holds Blue and White scrimmage Blue White Scrimmage Johnny Mehler, WLBZ 7 p.m. EDT October 4, 2015 University of Maine CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ORONO, Maine (NEWS CENTER) -- In just five days, the puck will drop at the Cross Insurance Arena for the national Ice Breaker Tournament to kick off the college hockey season. 
The University of Maine Black Bears, who are hosting the tournament, played in front of their fans for the first time on Sunday during the teams annual Blue and White tournament. 
Head coach Red Gendron was even out on the grill beforehand cooking up red hot dogs and burgers for the Black Bear faithful. Read or Share this story: http://on.wlbz2.com/1RpJF11 TOP VIDEOS
